snippet: A 15-year-old charged with terrorism-related offenses in Canada was initially arrested for armed robbery before the authorities realized he had planned to join jihadist fighters abroad, the police said Thursday.
abstract: Unidentified Canadian teenager, originally arrested in armed robbery, is charged with terrorism-related offenses after police realize he planned to join jihadists abroad.
lead_paragraph: A 15-year-old charged with terrorism-related offenses in Canada was initially arrested for armed robbery before the authorities realized he had planned to join jihadist fighters abroad, the police said Thursday.

headline.main: Canada: Boy Accused of Terror Ties
headline.print_headline: Canada: Boy Arrested in Robbery Is Now Linked to Terrorism Case
